summary: Completed testing of new features: UPI deep links (GPay, PhonePe, Paytm), payment method badges in Admin Panel, and ticket zoom controls on GameDetails page. All features working correctly.

Frontend: Zoom In button changes grid from 3/row to 2/row to 1/row
